name: Buddy
description: Buddy is a 3 year old Golden Retriever. He loves to play fetch and go on long walks.

name: Molly
description: Molly is a 2 year old Beagle. She loves to chase squirrels and nap in the sun.

name: Max
description: Max is a 5 year old German Shepherd. He loves to play frisbee and go swimming.
